subject: Re: [PATCH v2 2/2] selftests/cgroup: add test for zswap incompressible pages

reviews.author: Jiayuan Chen (author)
reviews.summary: The reviewer approved the patch and noted that it correctly tracks incompressible pages.

reviews.author: Yosry Ahmed
reviews.summary: The reviewer found the patch's comment not very useful but didn't object to it, and approved the code itself.

reviews.author: Nhat Pham
reviews.summary: Reviewer Nhat Pham suggested using MADV_PAGEOUT instead of memory.reclaim and approved the patch.

reviews.author: SeongJae Park
reviews.summary: Reviewer SeongJae Park approved the patch, suggesting minor formatting improvements and a potential future revisit to address racy test results.

reviews.author: JP Kobryn
reviews.summary: Reviewer JP Kobryn suggested using synchronization, specifically an eventfd, to prevent a potential race condition between the parent and child processes in the selftest.

reviews.author: Chengming Zhou
reviews.summary: Reviewer Chengming Zhou approved the patch and gave a Reviewed-by tag, but did not provide any specific technical feedback.
